title: "Another Finger on the Racist Monkey's Paw Closes" - with James Mendez Hodes
itunes:title: "Another Finger on the Racist Monkey's Paw Closes" - with James Mendez Hodes
description:
Game designer and cultural consultant James Mendez Hodes sits down with the Halflings to discuss how we can enrich our games by creating more equal and inclusive experiences.


James' Website: https://jamesmendezhodes.com/

Follow James @LulaVampiro


If you enjoy this podcast please help us out by leaving a review and sharing with your fellow adventurers.

Support us on Patreon at patreon.com/tbhalflings for your Shirefolk Shoutout and Bonus Episodes.

Connect with us on Twitter, Instagram and Facebook @tbhalflings, on our Discord or email secondbreakfast@tbhalflings.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
